title: HdRezkaApi Documentation
description:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/HdRezkaApi)](https://pypi.org/project/HdRezkaApi/) [![](https://shields.io/badge/GitHub-141414?logo=github)](https://github.com/SuperZombi/HdRezkaApi)

Unofficial Python library for parsing content from HDRezka.

items.code:
from HdRezkaApi import HdRezkaApi
from HdRezkaApi import TVSeries, Movie

url = 'https://hdrezka.ag/__YOUR_URL__.html'
rezka = HdRezkaApi(url)

if rezka.ok:
    print(rezka.name)

    if rezka.type == Movie:
        urls = rezka.getStream()(720)
    elif rezka.type == TVSeries:
        urls = rezka.getStream(season=1, episode=1)(720)

    print(urls)
